Html:
Hi! I need to embed images (but not references) in email body with NetOffice Outlook.
The only information I found is the following:
http://www.codeproject.com/Tips/326346/How-to-embed-a-image-in-email-body
But this method doesn't work with NetOfiice (I didn't find anything similar to LinkedImage.ContentId = "MyPic").
Can anybody give an idea?

P.S.
I found the solution:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8480534/embeding-images-in-an-email-using-outlook-interop

I hope the informations can be useful :)
